title: New Content Revealed for Zombie Vikings: Ragnarök Editiön!
content:
Rising Star Games would like to remind you that they are sifting through six feet of Norse soil to unearth a physical boxed release of Zoink Games’  Zombie Vikings: Ragnarök Editiön this October on the PlayStation®4! 
 
The physical release of Zombie Vikings: Ragnarök Editiön is going to be loaded with additional game content too!!! Feast on the new features below like it was an all-you-can-eat brain buffet. 
 

 
Zombie Vikings Key Features: 
 1 to 4-player brawler featuring online or couch co-op gameplay  Hilarious story written by Zach Weinersmith (Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal)  
Exclusive to the physical box version, Zombie Vikings: Ragnarök Editiön: 
         5 bonus Versus Arenas          2 additional playable characters: Frostbjörn and Raybjörn          Zombie Vikings digital artbook  
[embedded content] 
 
www.zombie-vikings.com 
 
If you’ve got a mad craving for dem’ braaaains and want to get a jump start on a review, we do have a very small batch of review keys available for Zoink’s digital release of Zombie Vikings on the PS4 (PSN). However, please note that the digital version of the game does not feature the additional content that is exclusive to the physical release, Zombie Vikings: Ragnarök Editiön , being published by Rising Star Games this October. 
 Tagged under:  Zombie Vikings
